info.author: Bal kishore pandey
info.description:
===========
National Instrument assignment
===========

This assginment is prepared as per of the requirements of National instrument GmbH, Berlin.
It does the following:
	1) parsing the XML file
	2) validating against a given schema
	3) storing the data in a mongodb database.
Typical usageon microsoft windows 7 often looks like this::

    1) Starting the Mongodb database by typing the following in the cmd:
			cd c:\mongodb\bin
			mongod
    2) Running the python file:
                        #!/usr/bin/env python
info.name: Native-instrument-assingment
info.html_description:
===========
National Instrument assignment
===========

This assginment is prepared as per of the requirements of National instrument GmbH, Berlin.
It does the following:
1) parsing the XML file
2) validating against a given schema
3) storing the data in a mongodb database.
Typical usageon microsoft windows 7 often looks like this::

1) Starting the Mongodb database by typing the following in the cmd:
cd c:\mongodb\bin
mongod
2) Running the python file:
#!/usr/bin/env python
